OrderRequest.title: Order Request
OrderRequest.description: Request body for placing an order. If `customer access token` is provided, `customer_address_id` is required. Otherwise, the rest of the fields are required.

customer_address_id.description: Address ID of the customer, required if `customer access token` is provided.

first_name.description: First name of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

last_name.description: Last name of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

country_id.description: ID of the country. Required if access token` is not provided.

phone_number.description: Phone number of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

address.description: Primary address of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

address_details.description: Additional details for the address of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

city.description: City of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

state.description: State or province of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.

zip_code.description: ZIP code of the guest. Required if `customer access token` is not provided.
